definitions.text:
Glutton
 glut'n. [Low Latin gluto.] One who indulges excess in eating.
1. One eager of any thing excess.Gluttons in murder, wanton destroy.
2. In zoology, an animal of the genus Ursus, found in the

of Europe and Siberia. It grows the length of three feet, but has short legs and moves slowly. It is a carnivorous animal, and in order catch its prey, it climbs a tree and from that darts down upon a deer or other animal. It is names from its voracious appetite.
